text: Marlin Andrew Stutzman (born August 31, 1976) is an American politician who is a member of the United States House of Representatives for Indiana's 3rd congressional district since 2025. He represented the district before from 2010 to 2017. He is a Republican. Stutzman was a member of the Indiana House of Representatives from 2002 to 2008. He was a member of the Indiana Senate from 2009 to 2010. Stutzman was a candidate for the U.S. Senate in the 2010 election, however he lost the Republican nomination to former Senator Dan Coats. He ran again for the U.S. Senate in 2016, however he lost the nomination to U.S. Representative Todd Young. In April 2023, Stutzman announced he was running for his old seat again in the 2024 elections. He won the general election in November 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Links formerly displayed via the CongLinks template: * Biography at Ballotpedia * Congressional profile at GovTrack * Congressional profile at OpenCongress * Congressional profile at Roll Call Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Indiana Category:Politicians from Michigan Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Marlin Stutzman
